item.title: Bitcoin Price Watch; Let's Get In The Markets! - NEWSBTC
item.description:
Bitcoin Price Watch; Let's Get In The Markets! - NEWSBTC

Here's a look at what we are focusing on in the bitcoin price this morning. It's time to take a look at the bitcoin price markets this Wednesday morning, and see if we can't pick a profit from the action throughout the day.

item.title: Deutsche Bank Net Income Plummets By 98%
item.description:
Deutsche Bank Net Income Plummets By 98%

Despite their cost-cutting efforts funds is leaking out of the ship on all sides. Moreover, they have been fined several times, and other regulatory investigations against DB are still underway. Sooner or later something will have to give. Deutsche Bank continues to make media headlines as of late, albeit hardly any of them are positive for the financial institution.

item.title: How do you build a blockchain?
item.description:
How do you build a blockchain?

I find the atlatl or Spear-thrower to be incredibly ingenious. And several geniuses in various parts of the world, 40,000 years ago, thought it up, produced it, and used it. The use of mechanical advantage, long before there was any math or physics to explain it, is quite wonderful.

item.title: Reminder: Previous posts showing that Blockstream's opposition to hard-forks is dangerous, obstructionist, selfish FUD. As many of us already know, the reason that Blockstream is against hard forks is simple: Hard forks are good for Bitcoin, but bad for the private company Blockstream. * /r/btc
item.description:
Reminder: Previous posts showing that Blockstream's opposition to hard-forks is dangerous, obstructionist, selfish FUD. As many of us already know, the reason that Blockstream is against hard forks is simple: Hard forks are good for Bitcoin, but bad for the private company Blockstream. * /r/btc

There's not much new to say regarding the usefulness of hard forks. People have been explaining for a long time that hard forks are safe and...

item.title: Coinbase Isn't Supporting Ethereum Classic, Yet
item.description:
Coinbase Isn't Supporting Ethereum Classic, Yet

Digital currency exchange Coinbase has revealed its stance with the Ethereum hard fork, stating that it has no plans to support Ethereum Classic, the spin-off blockchain based on the consensus and protocols of the original Ethereum blockchain.

item.title: Delayed DECENT Network Crowdsale to Start Soon - NEWSBTC
item.description:
Delayed DECENT Network Crowdsale to Start Soon - NEWSBTC

DECENT, the blockchain based content distribution platform is launching its crowdsale soon. Read more... DECENT Network, the blockchain content distribution solution platform has announced the crowdsale of its Decent (DCT) tokens. The DECENT Computer Code sale, as the platform prefers to call it, is aimed at creating a secure and independent publishing network powered by the distributed ledger technology.

item.title: Will Work It For Bitcoin: Modern Escorts Use Cryptocurrency
item.description:
Will Work It For Bitcoin: Modern Escorts Use Cryptocurrency

The modern escort relies on all manner of technological tools to help facilitate the trade, including Bitcoin. According to an Australian escort based in London known as Oz, technological prowess can factor highly in the modern escort's game.

item.title: A proposal for a genuinely distributed blockchain and pruning
item.description:
A proposal for a genuinely distributed blockchain and pruning

item.title: No title
A Quick Guide on How to Mine Steem on Windows
item.description:
A Quick Guide on How to Mine Steem on Windows

Steem is a blockchain-based social media platform where anyone can earn rewards by contributing quality content and rating content published by others. You can also mine it using a dedicated CPU miner if you have some spare power that you want to dedicate to supporting the network.
